comments.body: Not sure from where this name comes but other sources has different naming patterns.

Yeah I saw the other sources names and I have added the AppStatus source in the past, are there any restrictions on naming? I tried to be very specific about where the metrics from because there are consumers all over the place eg. executors. How about `driver-consumer`?

I'm feeling `structured-streaming` is not needed (not important), whereas other parts sound good to classify. If Spark doesn't have been classifying where the metric comes from in metric name, `driver` might be another one to get rid of.
